entry.title: Jury in Aurora, Colo., mass shooting trial shown graphic photos
entry.summary: But when they placed him in the police car near a back door to the theatre, "he would look around like he was taking it all in," Aurora police officer Jason Oviatt said.

entry.title: Aurora Shooting Victim's Gruesome Injury Described in Court
entry.summary: PHOTO: Caleb Medley, who was shot in the head during the massacre at the theater in Aurora, Colo., is shown during the opening day of the trialshooting suspect James Holmes, April 27, 2015, in Centennial, Colo.

entry.title: Aurora, Colo., theater shooting victims, families steel themselves for trial
entry.summary:
Tom Teves speaks at a news conference in Aurora, Colo., shortly after the shooting that left his son dead.

Tom Teves' son Alex, 24, had just earned his master's degree in counseling psychology when he was killed shielding his girlfriend from the hail of bullets in the Aurora, Colo., movie theater.

entry.title: US Senate veterans committee plans hearing in Aurora to scrutinize over-budget VA hospital
entry.summary: The hearing will be held April 24 in suburban Aurora, where the hospital is being built, the committee announced Thursday.

entry.title: Jury seated in Colorado theater shooting trial
entry.summary: FILE - In this June 4, 2013 file photo, Aurora theater shooting suspect James Holmes is seated in court in Centennial, Colo.

entry.title: National Guardsman and His Cousin Arrested for Trying to Join ISIS
entry.summary: Both men are from Aurora, Illinois, and will be appearing in federal court later today.
